abstract: ISkoot, the company that lets you make Skype Internet calls from your mobile phone, has raised $19 million in more venture capital to build an ambitious mobile platform for AT&T, VentureBeat reported.
lead_paragraph: ISkoot, the company that lets you make Skype Internet calls from your mobile phone, has raised $19 million in more venture capital to build an ambitious mobile platform for AT&T, VentureBeat reported.

headline.main: ISkoot Takes $19 Million to Build Platform for AT&T, Report Says

abstract: In its second wireless deal in two days, AT&T announced Friday evening that it would buy Centennial Communications, a regional wireless phone company, for $944 million in cash, a price that is more than double Centennial’s stock market value.
lead_paragraph: In its second wireless deal in two days, AT&T announced Friday evening that it would buy Centennial Communications, a regional wireless phone company, for $944 million in cash, a price that is more than double Centennial’s stock market value.

headline.main: AT&T to Buy Centennial for $944 Million in Cash
